metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9891 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: drivers/misc/qseecom.c in the Qualcomm components in Android before2016-08-05 on Nexus 5 devices does not validate certain buffer addresses,which allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application thatmakes an ioctl call, aka Android internal bug 28749283 and Qualcomminternal bug CR550061.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
